body:
I think it's about time that I finally came out, recently I have been really inactive because of school and stuff, most of the time I would come on for 5 minutes a day and so on. I would just like to let all you wombats know, I'm retiring, I havn't been demoted. Hopefully I will be able to come back at a later date, which will be good to see.

I would like to thank the community, you were the people that made me like my job. Even if you were a hacker that I banned, or just a regular, I liked you all. Thankyou very much.

I would also like to thank the whole staff team, it was a great time working with you guys, and I hope to be back in it later, keep up the good work <3

- Harry

title: My Retirement.

Good luck in school!

Thank You Harry,
For being a great friend, enemy and awesome pal. We had a lot of great times together and the time was slim but the time was precious and we made so many memories I hope you go well in school and do good stuff don't do drugs, stay in school. Thank you for being a great moderator @Tabmow your a good kid see you around... Maybe.
